title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties  Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17. Looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: On motif platforms, the text fields in the Project Properties Info page have automatic borders that identify them as user input targets. Additionally, on Solaris/AIX/HPUX, these fields have different colored backgrounds which make them stand out much worse.
EB: The text fields should be created as readonly Labels instead of text fields. This may be done so that their values can be selected and copied by the user.
SR:
1. Launch the application on any motif platform.
2. Open the Project Properties dialog.
3. Go to the Info page.
4. Observe the text fields and the automatic borders around them.
5. Observe the different colored backgrounds of the text fields on Solaris/AIX/HPUX.
